post.author: 임정숙
post.content:
workopolis에서 찾은 계약일입니다. 혹시나 원하시는 분들이 계신가 해서 첨부 해봅니다.

-------
ACORN WEB DEVELOPMENT INC.  
Internet Programmer (PERL,PHP,MySQL)  
  
Job Type: Contract  
Location: Toronto,ON;  
Job Category: Computers-Internet, Consulting  
Industry: Internet Development  
Year(s) of Experience: 2  
Number Of Positions: 2  
Date Posted: Jan 29, 2004  
Contact E-mail:  acornjobs@awdi.ca  
  
   We are looking for individuals to work on a 3-6 month contract position with a possibility of an extension. The successful candidates will be responsible for supporting existing web based programs, scripts and databases. You must have strong Linux and Perl knowledge as well as excellent communication skills to be selected for this position.


RESPONSIBILITIES/DUTIES

Duties include analysis, programming, implementation, maintenance, modification, re-engineering, and documentation:


REQUIRED SKILLS

• Excellent communication and English skills
• 3+ years experience with UNIX / Linux systems
• 3+ years experience with Perl programming
• 3+ years experience with MySQL databases
• 3+ years experience with PHP programming
• Ability to solve problems quickly and completely
• Strong interpersonal skills
• Independent worker capable of taking a task to completion
• Ability to work well with others


You will be required to work from our customers office in Toronto. To be considered for this position you must be able to start immediately.

Salary to be negotiated.

Please send your cover letter, portfolio and resume to acornjobs@awdi.ca.



  
Contact E-mail:  acornjobs@awdi.ca
post.title: Internet Programmer (PERL,PHP,MySQL)
